kou commented on issue #2081: ARROW-2635: [Ruby] Remove needless LICENSE.txt
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2081#issuecomment-391916491
 
 
   No. It's not included in the gems.
   Gem itself has license information but it's better that we should include `LICENSE.txt` and `NOTICE`.txt`.
   
   I'll add them in this pull request.

kou commented on issue #2081: ARROW-2635: [Ruby] Remove needless LICENSE.txt
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2081#issuecomment-391919292
 
 
   I reconsider about this.
   Apache Arrow Ruby only has newly written codes. So it's not suitable for reuse `/LICENSE.txt` and `/NOTICE.txt`. It's better that we have `LICENSE.txt` and `NOTICE.txt` for Apache Arrow Ruby.
   
   I'll close this pull request and re-create a new pull request.

kou closed pull request #2081: ARROW-2635: [Ruby] Remove needless LICENSE.txt
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2081

As GitHub hides the original diff on merge, it is displayed below for
the sake of provenance:
